Negative_Review: No refrigerator in the room and double bed was queen size The rooms at Tim Hotel Blanche included nespresso but this one doesn t
Positive_Review: Goood size of room and toilet

Negative_Review: One suggestion is the Breakfast could be better with a bit more choices
Positive_Review: Nice location and friendly staff room is quite clean and bathroom is very good

Negative_Review: Just a tad disappointed in the room there wasn t a lot of counter top space in the bathroom to put out toiletries other essentials necessitating the need to use the minimal space on night tables and shelf under the TV With 1 armoire and nothing else for clothing and 2 gal pals traveling together it was a tight squeeze for storage The room card for opening the door was also the card you must use to turn on the electricity While this is energy saving knowing in advance would have forced us to bring multiple adapters instead of 1 to recharge all devices at night you can t recharge if you re not in the room While the front desk did have adapters to loan out unfortunately they weren t compatible with my devices
Positive_Review: The beds were extremely comfortable which is very important to me Loved the 2 chairs with small table to sit while reading or watching the TV and the in room kettle was great While there is satellite TV the majority of the channels were news programs and all channels were in French Since I speak Fr that was not a problem but if you don t you won t get much use out of the TV The location was quiet in a more residential section of the city However if you want to be closer to a lot of activity when you step out your door choose a different location of Timhotel 3 metro stops within walking distance about 5 minutes away and the front door was always locked The front desk opened it when you buzzed in a nice touch for security The staff especially Farrann were always helpful

Negative_Review: Room was not clean hair on the bathroom floor from previous guests that was never cleaned Garbage was not emptied daily Extra pillow was stained with no pillow case Carpet not vacuumed for entire 3 day stay
Positive_Review: Big elevator balconnet wifi was good

Negative_Review: Nothing
Positive_Review: Lovely room I had a seating area and plenty of space quite rare for Paris The staff were great and it was a 3 min walk to my office There are lots of fab bistros in the area as well

Negative_Review: I didn t have breakfast myself but breakfast was served at the lounge next to the check in area I wouldn t like that Also i missed bathrobes I had towels but i expected robes aswell
Positive_Review: The design the bed and amazing shower

Negative_Review: Location was a bit further away from the subway than I hoped for A mini fridge with drinks in the room would be welcome
Positive_Review: Great hotel and great staff Really good value for money

Negative_Review: No heating Freezing in Paris when there and my room was literally freezing Heating did not work at all When I alerted reception at check out their response was v poor I don t feel the cold usually btw Receptionist said sometimes they turn the heating off but she didn t know and that heat not good when you sleep
Positive_Review: V comfortable bed Clean room with nice decor Good size Good shower

Negative_Review: The only fault was some peeling paint on the bathroom window hard to miss in an inspection
Positive_Review: Location was great as were the staff The room was very modern and had a nice balcony

Negative_Review: There was no attention to detail the towel rods had dust over them they weren t clean and when the rooms around us flushed we could hear that loud and clear It was so annoying to say the least The planning of the hotel is crazy
Positive_Review: The hotel was close to Montmartre and hence if you would like to visit there you won t lose too much time in travel

Negative_Review: The staff specifically the afternoon evening staff person was not informative could not suggest a place for dinner nor provide directions to one of the cafes listed in their directory Also I had booked an airport shuttle through the hotel for 7 a m and at my 6 a m wake up call was informed it was coming at 6 30 and in my haste left a couple of articles luckily not of any value just annoying given the circumstances
Positive_Review: The room and bathroom were nice and clean the decor is basic but it ft my needs

Negative_Review: We didn t have breakfast but it looked a little expensive
Positive_Review: Light airy room with small balcony very romantic Central to Pigalle area for restaurants and fabulous jazz bar

Negative_Review: The staff were so laid back they kept missing important moments of customer service They said they would upgrade my room as it was my partners birthday they didn t They told me I hadn t paid my accommodation I had Housekeeping never came and the facilities were awful
Positive_Review: The room was lovely Everything you need and very modern and fresh

Negative_Review: Would have liked a restaurant and bar
Positive_Review: It was very well located and the staff were very helpful in attending to out needs particularly Farrand Top class finish to the room and bathroom a 4 star establishment in a great spot Only thing missing was a restaurant and bar

Negative_Review: No slippers the shower room is slippery its like it was not properly washed after someone used it before us
Positive_Review: All staff are very helpful kind and polite The room always clean when u come back from the hotel Good location Very quite you can rest and sleep easily without noise from the city crowd My daughter of 2 years old enjoyed the huge room

Negative_Review: Breakfast was good but small not much food to choose from
Positive_Review: The room was very clean and modern The bed was super comfortable The neighborhood was pretty quiet overall Overall the hotel looks clean and modern perfect for a one night business stay

Negative_Review: Rude night staff
Positive_Review: The first room I was allocated Room 12 was noisy and the wifi kept breaking down I went downstairs and mentioned it to the night staff who couldn t cared less Told me he wasn t an IT expert or in customer service evidently The following morning I mentioned it again to Pierre immediate action moved rooms and confirmed several times if all was OK a real champion

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: I regularly stay in the hotel The staff is very friendly professional and accommodating The rooms are all very complete refreshments toileteries a super comfortable bed and clean Design bathrooms Size of room depends on booked room type but even the smallest is okay for Paris The area is lovely very central but in a quiet neighbourhood with lots of nice typical restaurants

Negative_Review: Leaking sink in bathroom Solution for staff was to provide more towels none were provided in the room upon arrival Temperature in the room could not be controlled in the room but I had to contact the reception The breakfast is very small and definitely not worth 13 50 Also the price of the room which is tiny is ridiculously high Finally all rooms face a noisy busy road
Positive_Review: Close to business location

Negative_Review: Quite congested property but then this is Paris No breakfast room Breakfast was served in the foyer next to the reception
Positive_Review: Location is the strong point Additionally we got a room which was divided into two parts and actually quite spacious for Paris standards

Negative_Review: It s a little bit far from the subway station No fridge

Negative_Review: Small No room for 2 suitcases I didn t take breakfast but I did saw what they offered very little and in a very small and warm lobby
